items.sentence: She denied having met him even though we saw them talking to each other.
Everything that I saw was completely different from what I had expected.
I wonder whether or not Tom has ever asked Mary why she didn\'t do that.
Tom certainly wouldn\'t be pleased if Mary went out on a date with John.
Tom lived three miles away from Mary when they were both in high school.
Don\'t forget to tell Mary that she doesn\'t need to do that by herself.
Shouldn\'t you phone home? Your parents will be wondering where you are.
I never imagined that my skills as a lawyer would be used to defend Tom.
Tom wanted more coffee, so I went into the kitchen and made another pot.
I think that you\'re the one I\'ve been waiting for for all these years.
